page.title: 12FARM(cont), THE COWDRAY ARMS
page.content: All the cows on the farm are Freisan cows and are black and white. They take the calves and bottle feed them so the dairy farmer can have the cows milk .The milk is kept in a big tank and they have a reserve tank just in case there is too much milk to go in one tank. {THE COWDRAY ARMS They have about 25 workers, some students who do just a few hours a week. The licensee and his wife have some weekends off and get only 2 weeks holiday a year. When they are away they have stand ins to keep the place open. They often work an 18 hour day.As the pub is on a busy road, with very few homes nearby, most of their customers are people passing by.They do not have many regular customers. The nearest pub is in Balcombe about 2 miles away.
